blog.name: my-mythical-otp
blog.title: Eros Heartache
blog.description: 100% NOT here for anyone to validate me, OG Rhink trash, Multifandom shitposter, Hedonist/Libertine, random other shit.... Message from fandom Grandma: You own your shit, you walk your talk. Its fantastic to be loved and happy, but own the knowlege you can and will be a problematic person to someone. You can be hated with validity and with take ownership of your faults. In the end you will never make yourself anything more than the sum of your life, perceptions and expierance. And that wisdom my loves, Is what makes all the diffence.

tags: i need to be able to find this again
summary: it took literal hours to find this video for @bi-astral but here is not only the scene where he describes riding stephen fry...
caption: it took literal hours to find this video for @bi-astral but here is not only the scene where he describes riding stephen fry like ‘a wild stallion’ but also as a ‘bucking bronco’, the scene cut in itself, and two extra sex scenes - one where he’s covered in chocolate spread (!!!???) and the other where he had to bark when he came (which coincidentally explains why he did the same thing in the recreation of when harry met sally with alan carr!!!!!)

summary: hi emily since you seem to have like. an encyclopaedic knowledge of All Things Sheen do you know where i could possibly find the...
question: hi emily since you seem to have like. an encyclopaedic knowledge of All Things Sheen do you know where i could possibly find the interview of him saying 'i had to ride stephen fry like a wild stallion' or even just gifs of it? asking for a friend thanks xx
answer:
OMFG I FOUND IT!!!!!!!

whoever made this is an absolute star - it’s cut between the different interviews where he’s explained it and also the three sex scenes he describes are cut in too. sooo funny

also can i just say this ask was hilarious to me because a couple of months ago i barely knew who michael sheen even was and even now ive still only seen him in 1 film and 1 tv show and yet ive fallen straight into the rabbit hole and have become the go-to-gal for msheen knowledge

summary: Watching Tron: Legacy at the moment - yes, I will (re)watch every single film Michael Sheen has been in - and god damn, this...
body: Watching Tron: Legacy at the moment - yes, I will (re)watch every single film Michael Sheen has been in - and god damn, this androgynous, futuristic look on Michael is doing it for me… 😍🤤👌🏻

reblog.comment: Watching Tron: Legacy at the moment - yes, I will (re)watch every single film Michael Sheen has been in - and god damn, this androgynous, futuristic look on Michael is doing it for me… 😍🤤👌🏻
